hmTracking.name: hmTracking
hmTracking.contactinfo: Customer Support Postal: Hirschmann Automation and Control GmbH Stuttgarter Str. 45-51 72654 Neckartenzlingen Germany Tel: +49 7127 14 1981 Web: http://www.hicomcenter.com/ E-Mail: hicomcenter@hirschmann.com
hmTracking.description: The Hirschmann Private Tracking MIB definitions for Platform devices.

hmTrackingTable.name: hmTrackingTable
hmTrackingTable.description: This table contains variables to define an entry in the Hirschmann Tracking database.

hmTrackId.name: hmTrackId
hmTrackId.description: The id of an object being tracked.

hmTrackRowStatus.name: hmTrackRowStatus
hmTrackRowStatus.description: Defines the status of the Tracking database entry. Set to createAndWait(5) to create a new row. Set to destroy(6) to delete an entry. Set to notInService(2) to change an entry. Reads as active(1) if the tracked object exists and is trackable, notReady(3) otherwise.

hmTrackType.name: hmTrackType
hmTrackType.description: The kind of an object being tracked.

hmTrackState.name: hmTrackState
hmTrackState.description: Shows if the tracked object is currently UP or DOWN.

hmTrackNumberOfChanges.name: hmTrackNumberOfChanges
hmTrackNumberOfChanges.description: The number of state changes after an object being tracked, entered its operational state. If the current state was entered prior to the last re-initialization of the local network management subsystem, then this object contains a zero value.

hmTrackTimeSinceLastChange.name: hmTrackTimeSinceLastChange
hmTrackTimeSinceLastChange.description: The time difference to the last state change of an object being tracked (in hundredths of a second). If the current state was entered prior to the last re-initialization of the local network management subsystem, then this object contains a zero value.

hmTrackIfNumber.name: hmTrackIfNumber
hmTrackIfNumber.description: The number of the interface being tracked. The number of the interface to send ping packets. For ping objects the value 65535 is used to show that no valid interface number has been set. It cannot be written.

hmTrackIfLinkUpDelay.name: hmTrackIfLinkUpDelay
hmTrackIfLinkUpDelay.description: If a link-up recovers within this delay, the tracked object is not considered as up.

hmTrackIfLinkDownDelay.name: hmTrackIfLinkDownDelay
hmTrackIfLinkDownDelay.description: If a link-down recovers within this delay, the tracked object is not considered as down.

hmTrackPingIpAddress.name: hmTrackPingIpAddress
hmTrackPingIpAddress.description: The IP address of the router being monitored.

hmTrackPingInterval.name: hmTrackPingInterval
hmTrackPingInterval.description: The number of seconds between the pings to the target IP address.

hmTrackPingMiss.name: hmTrackPingMiss
hmTrackPingMiss.description: This specifies the number of consecutive ping misses until the tracked object is considered to be down.

hmTrackPingSuccess.name: hmTrackPingSuccess
hmTrackPingSuccess.description: This specifies the number of consecutive ping successes until the tracked object is considered to be up.

hmTrackPingTimeout.name: hmTrackPingTimeout
hmTrackPingTimeout.description: This specifies the timeout in milliseconds for a ping reply. After the timeout the ping reply is considered as lost.

hmTrackPingTTL.name: hmTrackPingTTL
hmTrackPingTTL.description: This specifies the time to live for a ping request packet.

hmTrackPingBestRouteIfNumber.name: hmTrackPingBestRouteIfNumber
hmTrackPingBestRouteIfNumber.description: This shows the number of the interface which belongs to the best route. The interface number is zero if the best route is not used to send ping packets.

hmTrackLogicalOperator.name: hmTrackLogicalOperator
hmTrackLogicalOperator.description: Defines the logical operation performed on the instances

hmTrackSendStateChangeTrap.name: hmTrackSendStateChangeTrap
hmTrackSendStateChangeTrap.description: Enables or disables the sending of a trap when hmTrackState changes

hmTrackingApplicationTable.name: hmTrackingApplicationTable
hmTrackingApplicationTable.description: This table contains information about registered applications, for each object being tracked.

hmTrackAppId.name: hmTrackAppId
hmTrackAppId.description: The id of an application which tracks an object.

hmTrackAppName.name: hmTrackAppName
hmTrackAppName.description: The name of the registered application.

hmTrackLogicalInstanceTable.name: hmTrackLogicalInstanceTable
hmTrackLogicalInstanceTable.description: This table contains information the tracking instances that are combined into a logical tracking instance.

hmTrackLogicalInstanceId.name: hmTrackLogicalInstanceId
hmTrackLogicalInstanceId.description: The id of an object that is a member of the logical tracking object.

hmTrackLogicInstRowStatus.name: hmTrackLogicInstRowStatus
hmTrackLogicInstRowStatus.description: Defines the status of the Logic Tracking member entry. Set to createAndGo(4) to create a new row. Set to destroy(6) to delete an entry. Reads as active(1) if the row exists.

hmTrackStatusChangeEvent.name: hmTrackStatusChangeEvent
hmTrackStatusChangeEvent.description: Sent when the state of a tracking instance changes between up and down.
